text: 38:25-26 Ua Me Ini 30:11-16; Matyu 17:24Ezɨ me silva medima, an osɨmtɨzim ghua 3,430 kilogremɨn tu. Gumazir ziaba akɨnafarimɨn itiba silvan kaba amadazɨma da ize. Ezɨ gumazir 20plan azenibar tugha ghuavanadiba, me vaghvagha 5 kina silvan dagɨaba arɨki, ezɨ gumazir kaba bar men dɨbobonim 603,550.
